seeds.title: Secure the digital front door
seeds.today: Change the Wi-Fi admin password (router login) and store it somewhere safe.
seeds.this_week: Turn on a guest Wi-Fi network for visitors and smart devices.
seeds.this_month: Check for a router update and turn off remote admin if it isn’t needed.

seeds.title: Let devices look after themselves
seeds.today: Enable automatic updates on phones and laptops.
seeds.this_week: Turn on device lock (PIN or Face ID) and a short auto-lock timer.
seeds.this_month: Set up a simple backup for the most important device.

seeds.title: Protect the core accounts
seeds.today: Add an extra sign-in step to your main email account.
seeds.this_week: Review recovery options and remove any that are no longer used.
seeds.this_month: Use a password manager for your most important accounts.

seeds.title: Create a calm response to scams
seeds.today: Agree one rule: ‘If it feels urgent, pause and check first.’
seeds.this_week: Decide how your household verifies messages (official site, card number, trusted contact).
seeds.this_month: Teach children a simple ‘Stop / Tell / Check’ routine.

seeds.title: Protect sleep and attention
seeds.today: Charge phones away from beds tonight, if possible.
seeds.this_month: Do a calm app or notification tidy-up (10 minutes is enough).
